com.example.simple.jira.view
 
  • Classes in com.example.simple.jira.model.domain used by com.example.simple.jira.model.domain
    Class
    Description
    Project
    Immutable representation of a Jira-like project Project instances carry only identifier and name, while related tasks are managed by TaskRepository
    Task
    Immutable representation of a single task within a project
    TaskPriority
    Enumeration representing the possible priorities of a task
    TaskStatus
    Enumeration representing the possible statuses of a task
